html.htest: List of machines that had ping issues

table.title: List of machines with 3 consecutives ping failures

search.query: tags=NCSPing sourcetype=watchdogng* index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log result=KO name!=FR* name!=GE* | sort by -_time | convert ctime(_time) as Time timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | table Time, ipaddress, name, result | dedup name | rename ipaddress as "IP address", name as Name, result as Result

table.title: List of machines with 3 consecutives ping failures

search.query: tags=NCSPing sourcetype=watchdogng* index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log result=KO name!=FR* name!=GE* | convert ctime(_time) as Day timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | table Day, ipaddress, name |stats count as "Number of failure" by name |rename name as "Name" |sort by "Number of failure" desc

table.title: Machine with last clocking older than 8 hours

search.query: index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log tags=NCS_last_clocking |eval test= replace(last_clocking, "-","/")|eval test2=replace(test,"[.]",":")|eval test3=replace(test2,"T"," ")|eval test4=replace(test3,"Z"," ")|table name, test4, last_clocking_age_in_hours | rename name as "Name", test4 as "Date of the last clocking", last_clocking_age_in_hours as "Duration in hours since the last badging"|dedup Name |sort by "Duration in hours since the last badging" desc

format.field: duration in hours since the last badging
duration in hours since the last badging
Duration in hours since the last badging
Duration in hours since the last badging

search.query: index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log sourcetype=watchdogng* | search tags="url_infos_fr" | sort by _time desc | convert ctime(_time) as Day timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | fields + Day name result | rename Day as Time, name as URL, result as Status | dedup URL | table Time URL Status

panel.title: FR - Connectivity of the Field Managers

table.title: List of Field Managers with 3 consecutives ping failures

search.query: tags=NCSPing sourcetype=watchdogng* index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log result=KO name=FR* | convert ctime(_time) as Day timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | table Day, ipaddress, name | stats count as "Number of failure" by name, ipaddress | rename name as Name, ipaddress as "IP adress" | sort by "Number of failure" desc

panel.title: GE - Connectivity of the Field Managers

table.title: List of Field Managers with 3 consecutives ping failures

search.query: tags=NCSPing sourcetype=watchdogng* index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log result=KO name=GE* | convert ctime(_time) as Day timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | table Day, ipaddress, name | stats count as "Number of failure" by name, ipaddress | rename name as Name, ipaddress as "IP address" | sort by "Number of failure" desc

table.title: Morning employee import history (4:00 AM - 9:00 AM)
Mid day employee import history (9:00 AM - 2:00 PM)
Afternoon employee import history (2:00 PM - 7:00 PM)

panel.title: Maximum of SAP Export issues per Day

search.query: index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log sourcetype=watchdogng* | search tags=NCS_XAtlas_PHM_Imports | timechart span=1d max(not_exported_event) AS "Number of export issue(s)" | sort by -_time | convert ctime(_time) as Day timeformat="%d/%m/%y " | table Day, "Number of export issue(s)"
